section.name: Overview
section.p: In waterview world, a page rendering process is split into Page, Layout, Panel(s) and View(s) under each Panel, plus optional Action(s). Each one of them(Page, Layout, Panel, View and Action) has it's module ( An executable interface ) which is going to execute before the part is actually renderered.

section.name: Valve
section.p: Each valve is a normal component which extends com.cyclopsgroup.waterview.Valve. By default, the following valves are provided in order.

tr.td: Parser URL to get necessary information like page name, action name, etc.
Redirect the page to the error page if there's anything wrong
Valve that runs all the actions in this request
Use the corresponding plugable page renderer to render the requested page
